title: I got a problem
body:
Hey guys!
I need some help my past 2 games i played i had 130 ms for some reason.
Before that the highest my ping was like 40.
This happened when i turned on my PC and started league,i tried to get into a game with my friends and i had 130 ms.
This didnt happen before so can i  get some tips of what I can try? I would really appreciate it.
Thank you for tips! :D

replies.body: An increase in ping can be due to a network connection losing strength to the game server.  As Rineyy suggested, using our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to troubleshoot can get this fixed up.  Let me know if you run into any issues afterwards!
Thanks! It's working normally now :D I will inform you if anything happens :D

1. Restart your router / modem.
2. Restart your computer.

If your ping is still soaring;

[Troubleshoot your high ping.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)


http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

Welcomed! :) Have a Splash on the Fields of Justice!
